ygData.subject: Re: Standing Down
ygData.msgSnippet: Phobia looked to the sky as if it had all the right answers, the sky stared back mockingly not revealing it s vast knowlege. You re the wolf, you should be

Phobia looked to the sky as if it had all the right answers, the sky stared
back mockingly not revealing it's vast knowlege. "You're the wolf, you
should be able to find his scent." he stood at the edge of a sloping
landscape looking out to the horizon. "The Alliance and Starscream are
meeting us at the old cave." How're you holding up?" he placed a hand on her
chin "Any second thoughts about destroying the piece of slag?"
